page.title: 13Market Atmosphere
page.content:
The market is noisy and busy and there are alot of people around. There are lots of bargains in a market.There are people walking up and down and talking to each other.The people wander around looking at things for good bargains.In the market there are about 80 stalls. There are lots of vans because the stallholders can get their things in and out easily. There are market buses which bring people to and from the market at a certain time. There are lots of mothers with babies in prams and toddlers in pushchairs. There is music played all the time which makes the atmosphere happier. The smell of fish'N'chips flows through the market. In the market there are both old people and young people.
{By Michelle Toogood.
